description:
Algus Steel`s Doublade was used by Miriss Steel to ride on when she left the airship. It was also tasked with capturing Diancie but ended up getting turned into stone after Yveltal attacked it. It was later healed by Xerneas` Fairy Aura.
None of its moves were confirmed in the movie dialog.
name: Nidangill (Algus Steel)
